casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Blake J. REED. No. 141P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2007. Daniel J. Clifton, Charlotte, for Reed. *76Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 641 S.E.2d 320.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of March 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of March 2007."
